lyrics.text:
‘A e kainga ‘o Sīsū,
Ke mou ha’u ki heni,
Tau fai ‘etau fiefia,
Pea fakafeta’i.

Ko e katoanga ‘ofa,
Ku o tu’utu’uni,
Ko e me’akai totonu,
Ki he laumālie.

Mou ha’u ki he katoanga,
‘Oku mou ongo’i
‘Oku vaivai ho’omou ‘ofa,
Vaivai mo e tui.

Pea mo kimoutolu na,
Na’e mei hinga;
Mo toe ma’u, ‘a e ‘ofa,
‘A homou ‘Otua.

Ko e toki katoanga,
‘Oku fua lelei,
Ko e ‘ofa mo’onia,
Fakalaumālie.

Mou fakahā ‘i Saione,
‘I he loto lelei,
‘A ‘ene fakamo’ui.
Homou laumālie.
